Having a problem here, every time I go to rip and burn a DVD the process will not finish.  I have an error code of 105. I've read many other posts and no such luck on fixing it.  This is what I've done so far and come to a conclusion with:  
  The DVD output size does not want to stay on DVD-5, it changes to DVD-9 automatically even after I change it manually in Settings, and made sure to click memorize user interface.  This all happened when I installed Roxio Creator 2011.  I already uninstalled Roxio, along with uninstalling DVDfab 8, and also uninstalling the DVD/CD-Rom drive along with re-installing the drive.  I am still getting this error because the file is to big to put on a standard DVD.  PLEASE SOMEONE HELP.  I'VE TRIED EVERYTHING.
